events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund for the purchase as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product received.
The refund department agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the case and will respond shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund, and I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so that I can process your request more efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The product did not match the description on the website, so I would like to return it.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund upon receipt of the returned product. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for your prompt assistance. I will send the item back today using the return label.
We have received your returned item and the refund has been processed to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and there are no further questions or concerns. We’re here to help!
Thank you for your cooperation. Since the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Have a great day!
